Document.name: Write
Document.summary: Transform content and write to the target stream. This function may cache something to increase performance, so it cannot expect that all transformed content will be written to the target stream immediately.
Document.returns: Returns the actual size of the content before transforming that is written. The content is treated as being written even it is cached and not actually write to the target stream.
Document.param: A buffer storing the content to write.
The size of the content that is expected to write.
